mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: We make high-quality English-language literature easily accessible to readers in Germany and across Europe — fast, affordable, and with outstanding service.

story.title: Our Story
story.text1: Founded in 2024 out of pure passion for English books, because we ourselves spent years searching for great titles in Germany — often in vain.
story.text2: Today we ship hundreds of books every day to happy customers in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, and throughout the entire EU.

values.title: Our Values
values.quality_text: Only hand-picked, current, and original English editions.
values.service_text: Lightning-fast responses, personal advice, and a 100% satisfaction guarantee.
values.speed_text: Orders placed before 2 PM ship the same day.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.subtitle: Everything you need at a glance

items.question: How long does shipping take?
items.answer: Orders placed before 2 PM ship the same day. Delivery within Germany takes 1–2 business days via DHL.

items.question: Can I order from outside Germany?
items.answer: Yes! We ship to all EU countries, Switzerland, UK, Norway and many more.

items.question: Are the books original English editions?
items.answer: 100% yes — all books are original UK/US editions, never translated versions.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: PayPal, credit card, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Klarna (invoice & instalments), and bank transfer.

items.question: How do I return a book?
items.answer: You have 30 days to return anything, free of charge. Just write to support and we’ll send you a return label.

items.question: Do you offer gift wrapping?
items.answer: Yes! You can add gift wrapping and a personal message at checkout.

items.question: Are prices including German VAT?
items.answer: Yes — all prices include 7% German VAT (books rate). VAT is deducted automatically for B2B customers in other EU countries.

items.question: Can I track my order?
items.answer: Absolutely! You receive a DHL tracking link as soon as your order ships.
